definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

sentences.english: Comic dialogue actors often recite a poem before a performance to attract an audience.
sentences.chinese: 演之前都要念定場詩來吸引觀衆。
